content: mini raglan sweater ornament construction ‣ top-down ‣ in the round ‣ raglan increases ‣ no short-row neck shaping materials needles 3 mm dpns or short circular needles 3 5 mm dpn or short circular needles gauge 20 stitches x 32 row in stockinette on 3 5 mm needles yarn dk weight yarn 11 wpi meterage 48-54 metres size ~10cm body width ~13cm body length from hem to collar abbreviations k knit p purl m1r pick up the bar between stitches from back to front with the left needle knit through the back loop m1l pick up the bar between stitches from front to back with the left needle knit through the front loop bor beginning of round k2tog knit two stitches together decreasing 1 stitch ssk slip 1 stitch knitwise slip 1 stitch knitwise return stitches to left needle and knit together through the back loop decreasing 1 stitch pattern starts here using 3mm needles cast on 20 stitches using italian or your preferred cast-on method join in the round and place a bor marker work in k1p1 ribbing until the collar measures ~1cm or longer if working a folded collar switch to 3 5 mm needles knit one round while placing stitch markers as follows k3 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k6 pm k1 pm k2 pm k1 pm k3 there are now four raglan sections marked 01 raglan increases now work the yoke increase as follows r1 knit to next marker m1r slip marker k1 slip marker m1l x 4 knit to bor r2 knit all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 seven times total after the final increase round you should have 76 stitches on your needles as the stitch count increases you may wish to switch to short circular needles 02 body divide stitches for the body and sleeves remove all markers as you work this round k11 transfer next 16 stitches to scrap yarn cast on 1 stitch k22 transfer next 16 stitches to scrap yarn cast on 1 stitch k to bor you should now have 46 stitches on your needles knit in stockinette until the body measures 6 cm from the underarm switch to 3mm needle k one round then work k1p1 ribbing for 1 cm ~4 rounds bind off loosely using italian bind-off or your preferred method 03 sleeves using 3 5 mm needles transfer 16 sleeve stitches from scrap yarn onto the needles pick up 1 stitch from the underarm cast-on place the bor marker knit 1cm in stockinette ~3 row now begin sleeve decrease work one decrease every 7 rounds knit 6 rounds then decrease on the 7th round decrease round k2tog knit until 2 stitches before bor ssk repeat decrease rounds until you have worked 3 decrease rounds total after the third decrease round you should have 11 stitches on your needles continue knitting in stockinette for 6 more rounds or until the sleeve measures ~8 5 cm from the underarm decrease 1 stitch by k2tog
